abstract: From Bits: Judy Estrin, who has built several Silicon Valley companies and was the chief technology officer of Cisco Systems, says Silicon Valley is in trouble, and in a new book writes that the valley’s problems are symptomatic of an innovation crisis in the country as a whole.
